PERSONAL DETAILS
Location: 		West Yorkshire
QUALIFICATIONS
B.Eng. Mechanical Engineering – University of Huddersfield (2015)
CAREER SUMMARY
2019 to date: IESA LTD
Position: Technical Benefits Manager
2018 – 2019 Mansfield Pollard
Position: Project Manager
In his current role as Project Manager, he is responsible for running projects from handover by estimating to completion and install for multiple products, including bespoke air handling units and kitchen ventilation canopies. The Project values range from £1000 to £400,000 of which he has overseen up to 20 at a time.
This role includes:
Leading project hand over meetings
Liaise with the client throughout the course of each project
Checking CAD drawings prior to sending for approval
Creating the BOM for all required components and issuing to the procurement team
Making sure component lead times are taken into consideration when formulating the project schedule
Approving alternatives with component suppliers when long lead times mean our schedule cannot be met
Upon receiving drawing approval issuing all GA and construction drawings to production
Liaising with production to make sure that delivery dates are achieved
Discussing any controls packages and commissioning requirements with the electrical team
Organising site work including hiring equipment, completing site surveys and compiling RAMS
Organising delivery with the haulier and client to make sure any offloading requirements are met
Keeping track of long-term contracts and updating the account team with cost to completion each month
Updating the invoicing forecast to tie in with any changes that happen throughout each project
Attending weekly production meetings with the projects team and production teams to discuss live orders
Organising commissioning work following installation on site
Compiling O&M manuals and sending them to the client
Issuing invoices to the accounts team and closing out projects
2015 – 2018 HRS Hevac
Position: Project Engineer
In this role he was responsible for running up to 15 projects at any one time, from the procurement stage through to completion which included:
Creating technical drawings for bespoke Vessels and PHE skid packages using SolidWorks and AutoCAD
Working to specific design codes (PD5500 & BS853)
Liaising with customers to reach final approval of bespoke products
Answering project specific technical questions from customers
Material and sizing selections
Ordering items specific to each project in a timely manner to ensure deadlines are met
Working with the estimating department to ensure customers receive exactly what they require
Working with the production team throughout projects to assure products are manufactured correctly
Quality assurance of all projects
Organising delivery of projects to site
Writing up operating and maintenance manuals
Organising commissioning visits
Organising site visits to rectify any issues after delivery
Attending site to discuss projects
2009 – 2015
Various part-time Hospitality roles
2008 – 2009 National Accounting Centre
Position: Trainee Accounts Clerk
2004 – 2008
Various Hospitality roles.
COMMENT
He is a highly motivated project manager who works well on his own initiative individually or as part of a team. He is looking for employment in a project engineering role where he can expand his knowledge and experience whilst working with a range cutting edge technology. He is very career oriented and always looking to progress and improve himself. He is required to give 1 month notice at his current job.
Technical Skills:
AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Microsoft Office.
In addition, each of the jobs he had leading up to re-entering education at 21 gave him many transferable skills including:
• Excellent interpersonal skills and public relations
• Time management and organisational skills
• Team leadership and mentoring with the ability to motivate colleagues
• Ability to work successfully in a pressurised environment
• Professional integrity
• Initiative and self-motivation
Interests:
Outside work he is a very proactive person. He enjoys playing golf and other sporting activities. He finds that playing sport brings out his competitiv

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
